<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a6d8c5fe252f23cfda8d77eb957fe1fe2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a6d8c5fe252f23cfda8d77eb957fe1fe2">size</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup">ItemsGroup</a> &#42;CurGroup = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#aae9e6806da513c25ccd7e7c4cf4c2da2">GroupsHead</a>; CurGroup != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">         CurGroup = CurGroup-&gt;Next)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Result += CurGroup-&gt;getItemsCount();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup">ItemsGroup</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a29800b02a2baf858a5fe15c90c714f2f"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a29800b02a2baf858a5fe15c90c714f2f">ArrayTy</a> = std::array&lt;T, ItemsGroupSize&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Array of items kept by this group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a26c1fa2bf8cac04ab8ef503edf349c03"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a29800b02a2baf858a5fe15c90c714f2f">ArrayTy</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a26c1fa2bf8cac04ab8ef503edf349c03">Items</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pointer to the next items group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#aa2b097065cbd9e8fe9695ded1c5a8e1f"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::atomic&lt;ItemsGroup &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#aa2b097065cbd9e8fe9695ded1c5a8e1f">Next</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Number of items in this group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: ItemsCount could be inaccurate as it might be incremented by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// several threads. Use getItemsCount() method to get real number of items</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inside ItemsGroup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a6274095c04d4e37093643dd5df6945e6"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::atomic&lt;size&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a6274095c04d4e37093643dd5df6945e6">ItemsCount</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#ad9e89ae010ebb7816972b1ef17e1a6a9"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#ad9e89ae010ebb7816972b1ef17e1a6a9">getItemsCount</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::min(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a6274095c04d4e37093643dd5df6945e6">ItemsCount</a>.load(), ItemsGroupSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#ace40d57733365050bf57d1bfbe839f1a"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArrayTy::iterator <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#ace40d57733365050bf57d1bfbe839f1a">begin</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a26c1fa2bf8cac04ab8ef503edf349c03">Items</a>.begin(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#ac6db0d5ef5dbd748ee9042a0f336ce77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArrayTy::iterator <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#ac6db0d5ef5dbd748ee9042a0f336ce77">end</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a26c1fa2bf8cac04ab8ef503edf349c03">Items</a>.begin() + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#ad9e89ae010ebb7816972b1ef17e1a6a9">getItemsCount</a>(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocate new group. Put allocated group into the \\p AtomicGroup if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it is empty. If \\p AtomicGroup is filled by another thread then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// put allocated group into the end of groups list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// \\returns true if allocated group is put into the \\p AtomicGroup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a5884ad133d07d8bd3f0f24d37a93bff8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a5884ad133d07d8bd3f0f24d37a93bff8">allocateNewGroup</a>(std::atomic&lt;ItemsGroup &#42;&gt; &amp;AtomicGroup) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup">ItemsGroup</a> &#42;CurGroup = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Allocate new group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup">ItemsGroup</a> &#42;NewGroup = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a52bf80f6ad1dd26e853dc0fef4c10cc2">Allocator</a>-&gt;Allocate&lt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup">ItemsGroup</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewGroup-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#a6274095c04d4e37093643dd5df6945e6">ItemsCount</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewGroup-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#aa2b097065cbd9e8fe9695ded1c5a8e1f">Next</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to replace current group with allocated one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AtomicGroup.compare&#95;exchange&#95;weak(CurGroup, NewGroup))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Put allocated group as last group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurGroup) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup">ItemsGroup</a> &#42;NextGroup = CurGroup-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#aa2b097065cbd9e8fe9695ded1c5a8e1f">Next</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NextGroup) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurGroup-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/itemsgroup/#aa2b097065cbd9e8fe9695ded1c5a8e1f">Next</a>.compare&#95;exchange&#95;weak(NextGroup, NewGroup))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CurGroup = NextGroup;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#aae9e6806da513c25ccd7e7c4cf4c2da2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::atomic&lt;ItemsGroup &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#aae9e6806da513c25ccd7e7c4cf4c2da2">GroupsHead</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a44b37ce26c8d59ffa58ba554bf4a4cfc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::atomic&lt;ItemsGroup &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a44b37ce26c8d59ffa58ba554bf4a4cfc">LastGroup</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a52bf80f6ad1dd26e853dc0fef4c10cc2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/parallel/#a4e82d98d22361038741bca9bd34bca85">llvm::parallel::PerThreadBumpPtrAllocator</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/parallel/arraylist/#a52bf80f6ad1dd26e853dc0fef4c10cc2">Allocator</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
